articles.title: Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan denies reports of arrest in Dubai - India Today
articles.description: Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan039s clarification came after Pakistani media reported that he was arrested in Dubai over a defamation complaint by his former manager
articles.content:
Famous Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan has denied reports of him being arrested in Dubai, asking his followers not to pay heed to such news.
The singer's clarification came after Pakistani med… [+800 chars]

articles.title: Gautam Gambhir, Ajit Agarkar Chart the Way Forward as India Enter a New era - News18
articles.description: There were no diplomatic answers as Agarkar and Gambhir left nothing to the imagination while addressing critical matters – T20I captaincy, Jadeja's ODI future, what next for Hardik and more.
